posts.post_content:
Hi All, I just joined this site, and have reached out via email to Leon to confirm I am legit. I would like to sell/purchase T206 cards, as it is something I have become very interested in, rather quickly over the last few months. I have a nice Cubs collection I have put together, and am looking to sell as I accidently went in a direction I did not intend to. Currently my set contains the following, although I have other cards, they are for my private collection. I would like to sell these cards as a set, and am right now open to offers for the set, or a reasonable offer for any of the cards below. I am versed on the value of what I have, based on the many aspects available online. I can email close ups of each card, as I now have pictures taken this morning, so you may take a closer look. I currently have the following and am only posting this for a week, before I go back to adding to the set:

Frank Chance Batting Pose (Polar Bear) (Raw)   My guess is 1 or 1.5 if graded  ($180)
Johnny Evers Batting Yellow   PSA 3   (Not in possession until next week) ($425)
Solly Hofman PSA 4  ($230)
Johnny Kling PSA 2  ($247)
Rube Kroh PSA 4   ($208)
Pat Moran  SGC 50/4   ($82)
Orval Overall Portrait   PSA 2 ($145)
Orval Overall Hands at Face    PSA 4  ($265)
Francis Pfeffer (2) PSA 4 and SGC 40/3  ($165 and $100)
Jake Pfeister Pitching   SGC 60/5   ($204)
Francis Pfeister  Sitting     Raw (Crease not visible, I will undergrade as a 2) ($110)
Ed Reulbach  SGC 30/2  ($193)
Jimmy Sheckard No Glove Showing    SGC 40/3   ($135)
Harry Steinfeldt w/ Bat  PSA 4    ($189)
Heinie Zimmerman  (Very nice!) SGC 50/4   ($177)

Remember, there is a cost that goes in to grading, on top of the actual card value. I also offer free shipping, and pricing for the set would be lower than what I am asking for individual cards (Think 15%-27% discount for set) I am completely new to this (selling on this site is what I mean), and will be transparent. Looking for an offer to be made, and I will cover shipping cost via FedEx.  We can discuss payment transfer as well, and how to contact me.
All but Evers and Kling were sold today.  Thank You everyone!
Nice to be aboard!   This is so much fun collecting, trading, selling and buying!   Will be making a new post soon!
Looking for a good offer on this, what I currently have and would like to sell.
